basic_node.title: Object closer than min. distance
basic_node.description: Excentric allignment and different divergences of laser beam and reciever field of view will lead to different stages of overlapping, depending on distance from sensor.
basic_node.references: [re1, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: Geometric factor G(R): Overlap function O(R); p.8]
